alert.note: Alert for Dickinson (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 13 at 11:02AM CDT until May 17 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls SD has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Iowa... Little Sioux River near Milford affecting Dickinson County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING TO WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Sioux River near Milford. * WHEN...From Sunday morning to Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, significant amounts of pasture and other farm lands begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 9.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow morning to a crest of 13.5 feet early Monday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Tuesday evening. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Little Sioux River Milford 12.0 9.0 Sat 10 am 12.6 13.2 12.2 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Sunday afternoon at 115 PM CDT.
